basics.summary: This resume contains my most four important projects as a freelancer and my last dependency job. You can find out more in my personal or enterprise webpage. I am looking for position related to DevOps, docker, CI/CD or backend services where I can be challenged, learn new languages and improve my skills.

work.summary: CoFounded a software enterprise by my own company after 2 years of freelancing.
highlights: Clients in Argentina, France and Italy

work.summary: Setup Jenkin's pipelines to run different types of tests and send result to Slack.
highlights: Jenkins, Docker, Load Impact, Puppeteer, SiteSpeed, Sonarqube

work.summary: Developed microservices in NodeJS, 2 android application and 2 angular apps. It started as an internship but from 2018 they became a new client.
highlights: Android, Angular, Azure, Docker, Hibernate, Jasper Reports, Java, MSSQL, NodeJS, Swagger, Keycloak, Netflix Eureka

work.summary: Developed a complete project from scratch for a shipping company to track deliveries in a website. Maintained server to run services.
highlights: Angular, CentOS, Docker, MySQL, NodeJS, Swagger, TypeScript

work.summary: Created an open source project to help counting votes in Argentina's elections.
highlights: Android, Angular, Docker, MySQL, NodeJS, SQLite, Swagger, TypeScript
